result.ga: Cá bhfuil an lámh chlé agat
result.orig: Cá bhfuil an lámh chlé agat
result.html: Cá bhfuil an lámh chlé agatWhere is your left hand?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil an láṁ ċlé agatWhere is your left hand?

result.ga: Cá bhfuil an lámh dheas agat
result.orig: Cá bhfuil an lámh dheas agat
result.html: Cá bhfuil an lámh dheas agatWhere is your right hand?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil an láṁ ḋeas agatWhere is your right hand?

result.eng: He covered the receiver with his hand.
result.ga: Chuir sé a lámh ar bhéalóg an ghutháin
result.orig: Chuir sé a lámh ar bhéalóg an ghutháin
result.html: Chuir sé a lámh ar bhéalóg an ghutháinHe covered the receiver with his hand.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé a láṁ ar ḃéalóg an ġuṫáinHe covered the receiver with his hand.

result.html: Rug sé ar mo lámhHe grabbed my hand.
result.ponchtml: Rug sé ar mo láṁHe grabbed my hand.

result.eng: I am not too good. I have a pain in my hand.
result.ga: Níl mé rómhaith Tá pian i mo lámh
result.orig: Níl mé rómhaith Tá pian i mo lámh
result.html: Níl mé rómhaith Tá pian i mo lámhI am not too good. I have a pain in my hand.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé róṁaiṫ Tá pian i mo láṁI am not too good. I have a pain in my hand.

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ga: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.orig: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.html: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ponchtml: Tá ballḃrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar ḃuail mé mo láṁ ar ḋoras an ċairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.eng: Put this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.
result.ga: Cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíche
result.orig: Cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíche
result.html: Cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíchePut this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.
result.ponchtml: Cuir an t-ungaḋ seo ar do láṁ 'ċuile ṁaidin agus 'ċuile oíċePut this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.

result.eng: He raised his hand to scratch his chin.
result.ga: D'ardaigh sé a lámh chun a smig a thochas
result.orig: D'ardaigh sé a lámh chun a smig a thochas
result.html: D'ardaigh sé a lámh chun a smig a thochasHe raised his hand to scratch his chin.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ sé a láṁ ċun a smig a ṫoċasHe raised his hand to scratch his chin.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé lena ṁáṫair ar ġreim láiṁe go teaċ na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.eng: He looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ga: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.orig: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.html: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé ar an taċrán ar ġreim láiṁe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.

result.eng: She was eating a potato tart from her hand.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag ithe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirn
result.orig: Bhí sí ag ithe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirn
result.html: Bhí sí ag ithe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirnShe was eating a potato tart from her hand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag iṫe toirtín preátaí as cúl a doirnShe was eating a potato tart from her hand.

result.eng: He ate it up from his hand.
result.ga: D'ith sé suas as cúl a dhoirn é
result.orig: D'ith sé suas as cúl a dhoirn é
result.html: D'ith sé suas as cúl a dhoirn éHe ate it up from his hand.
result.ponchtml: D'iṫ sé suas as cúl a ḋoirn éHe ate it up from his hand.
